name: HallOfFame
title: Hall of Fame: Menu Simulations & Screensaver
author: stringweasel
description:
Factorio has a rich history of amazing creations, from highly optimized builds to beautiful and chaotic spaghetti. Bases that belong in a Hall of Fame.

This mod will play these memorable megabases in the background in the main menu. These are all beautiful pieces of art, and makes for an amazing screensaver.
